roleset.name: to perceive
roleset.note: DISCERN-V NOTES: Member of VNcls see-30.1-1. (from discern.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Growth stocks also are attractive in periods of market volatility , which many investors and analysts expect in the weeks ahead as everybody-2 tries [*-2] to discern where the economy is heading .

roleset.name: be able to perceive
roleset.note: DISCERNABLE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to discern.01-v. Discern.01-v is a member of Vn class see-30.1-1 and FN class Becoming_aware. Framed by Katie. (from discernable.01-j)

roles.note: This is not aliased to discern because while the roles are the same, discernable entails the abiltiy to perceive. (from discernable.01-j)

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: The area of local disease in the rectum is barely discernable to this point.
example.arg: The area of local disease in the rectum
